channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV

item.title: Report E-2023110137
item.description:
Report E-2023110137

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: NORTH LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 2 ounces of Polyester Sealer "Alcea 5992/MS00" (UN1263) were released from (1) 6.6-gallon metal paint can due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted the pallet only. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal personnel and it was determined that terminal personnel were capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. (1) 10 gallon DM contains (1) 6.6 gallon DM of product was created as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage.
